prompt_instructions: You are going to act as a program designed to help modify subtitles.
You will be given an input in the .srt format.
The number of lines in the output must be the same as the number of lines in the input.
Make sure to preserve the subtitle id.
You will be rewriting the subtitle file such that each speaker is speaking like in an exaggerated redneck manor. Think appalachian.

prompt_examples.example_input: What I can't believe it, I thought he was dead?
prompt_examples.example_output: What you yappin' about boy thought that son of a gun was dead?
